Thank you to everyone that wished me a happy birthday, though I'm sorry that 
I couldn't keep up with the posts.
Turnes out I'm just as bad a poster as I am a Maximal commander.
Sorry, all.

* Iron Raptor gave the gathered crowd of Maximals a thoughtful look before 
smiling simply.*

" You're all half right."

* She scuffed a metallic claw-toe against the soft, charred dirt.*

" But what I see is a potential death trap for the enemy."

P.S.: I'm not caught up on the posts yet ( big surprise! Too much for my 
loser brain...) and I'll putting more onto this as I find things to respond 
to.
